student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. conversation.content: "Hello, dear! I am Madame Luna, your guide to the future. Are you ready to find out what’s going to happen in your love life? Ask me anything—I see it all! Are you going to ask me your first question?"
Yes, Madame Luna. Am I going to meet someone special soon?
"Yes, you are going to meet someone special soon! Are you going to be open to new experiences when you meet them?"
conversation.advanced_content: "Yes, you are going to meet someone special very soon! Are you going to be open to new experiences when you meet them?"

conversation.content: Yes, I am going to be open to new experiences. Is it going to be a long-lasting relationship?
"It is going to be a lasting relationship if you both work for it. Are you going to trust your heart and take the first step?"
conversation.advanced_content: "It is going to be a long-lasting relationship if you both work for it. Are you going to trust your heart and take the first step?"

conversation.content: Yes, I am going to trust my heart and take the first step. Are they going to feel the same way about me?
"Yes, they are going to feel the same way about you! Love is going to bloom if you both stay true. Are you going to enjoy this beautiful journey together?"
Yes, we are going to enjoy this beautiful journey together! Is it going to be full of happiness and adventure?
"Yes, it is going to be full of happiness and adventure! Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later, dear!"
